ere are the triplets extracted from the text:

<The Stele of Sulaiman
1:
--------------------
Text: Stele of Sulaiman:  The principal benefactor is named as Sulaiman (), Prince of Xining (died 1351).
Triplets:<Stele of Sulaiman
2:
--------------------
Text: Stele of Sulaiman:  The stele, which is now held at the Dunhuang Academy, is renowned for an inscription of the Buddhist "mantra" "Om mani padme hum" in six different scripts.
Triplets:<Stele of Sulaiman
3:
--------------------
Text: Stele of Sulaiman:  Another stele, commemorating the restoration of the Huangqing Temple () in 1351 by Sulaiman was found at the same location as the 1348 stele.
Triplets:<Sulaiman
